channel.title: Computer Vision on Mohammad Faseeh Ahmed
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Mohammad Faseeh Ahmed

item.title: Web based Mitosis detection on Breast Cancer whole slide images using FasterRCNN and YOLOv5
item.description: Publication overview This paper was published by Science and Information Organization in International Journal of Advanced Computer Science Applications(IJACA), “Web based Mitosis detection on Breast Cancer whole slide images using FasterRCNN and YOLOv5”, It uses Mitosis which is one of the critical biomarker in Nottingham Breast Cancer Grading. Tech Stack ● Image Preprocessing - QuPath, Groovy ● Frontend - HistomicsUI(CADD4MBC) ● Database - MongoDB ● Deep learning Inference- YOLOv5, FasterRCNN

item.title: Tubules Detection on Breast Carcinoma Whole Slide Images using Artificial Intelligence Deep Learning Model
item.description: Publication overview We are presenting at John Hopkins Hospital, Baltimore, MD, USA at SIMMI-CMIMI22, International Conference On Machine Intelligence an Medical Imaging, “Tubules Detection on Breast Carcinoma Whole Slide Images using Artificial Intelligence Deep Learning Model”, An one of the critical biomarker in Nottingham Breast Cancer Grading. Tech Stack ● Image Preprocessing - QuPath, Groovy ● Frontend - HistomicsUI(CADD4MBC) ● Database - MongoDB ● Deep learning Inference- R2U-Net ● Deep learning training - Tensorflow, R2U-Net

item.title: Beverage Management System
item.description: Project overview This Web App aids in mobile inventory management. The frontend of the mobile device shows a stream of things being displayed; a deep learning model uses this data to identify the objects and automatically updates the Inventory Database frontend display with the changes. ● Using state of the art Yolov5 model with detection speed as low as 5ms per frame. ● Built the frontend using Streamlit. ● Using SQLite3 as a Database for managing inventory.
